row.Docu: It escapes the JIRA input parameters and wrap the parameter surrounded by quotes(").

row.process: : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JIRA URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
